subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Food premises must have facilities for the storage of garbage and recyclable matter thatâ€”

ol.li: adequately contain the volume and type of garbage and recyclable matter on the food premises; and
enclose the garbage or recyclable matter, if this is necessary to keep pests and animals away from it; and
are designed and constructed so that they may be effectively cleaned.
